message: Let's start fair. I get most of the money, but I'm willing to split it with you. Accept this offer, and we can both be happy.
Let's be fair.  We both get an equal share. This way, we both benefit and can avoid any further losses.

I'm willing to compromise.  Since you rejected my first offer, I'll give you a larger share this time. But if you continue to reject my offers, you'll lose a lot more money than me.  Let's end this now.
